Text.Page:
Damnable weather! Simple, implacable, bad-luck stormy weather sank my ship and scattered my cargo.

I think we can recover some of the weapon crates that washed up along Dragonturtle Beach. You can collect some flotsam for us, right?

Or is it jetsam? I can never keep them straight.
I miss the ship, but I can sell the cargo, <PCNAME>. Thanks.
You can't miss 'em. Wooden trunks full of weapons. On the beach, no less.
